column4: hello room, what is the recommended way to partition a 20gb hd for a new ubuntu install? 5 / 1 /swap and 14 /home ?
i never need more than 512 swap but 1 gig is fine too. 5 may be a little low but i normally run about 3-4 gigs for / that includes /usr and such
did you mean 5gb may be a little low for / ?
you can setup no password at login in gdmsetup
